#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int test_cases;
	scanf("%d", &test_cases);
	int n;
	int winner[1000000];
	int i, j, last_filled;
	winner[0] = 1;
	winner[1] = 0;
	winner[2] = 1;
	last_filled = 2;
	while(test_cases--)
	{
		scanf("%d", &n);
		for(i=last_filled+1;i<n;i++)
		{	
			if((i+1)%2!=0)
				winner[i] = 1;
			else
			{
				winner[i] = 0;
				for(j=2;j<=i+1-2;j+=2)
				{
					if((i+1-j)%j==0)
						winner[i] = 0;
					else if(winner[j-1]==0)
					{
						winner[i] = 1;	
						break;
					}	
				}
			}	
		}
		last_filled = n-1;
		if(winner[n-1]==0)
			printf("BKUL\n");
		else
			printf("BMEENA\n");	
	}
	return 0;
}
